unittitle.emph: Couples who attended the adult school at Mountain in Clay County: 1. Mr. & Mrs. Henry Waldrop; 2. Mr. & Mrs. Monroe Jones; 3. Mr. & Mrs. Willie Alford; 4. Mr. & Mrs. Craton Waldrop; 5. Mr. & Mrs. Brenton Fuller; 6. Mr. & Mrs. Jasper Mulkey; 7. Mr. & Mrs. Franklin Colley. These couples attended the adult school regularly. They all want a school next year
